message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand that $120 is a bit high for you, but $90 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110.
I'm still not comfortable with $110. I'm willing to pay $95, but that's as high as I can go.
I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you at $105, which is still a good deal for you, but closer to my minimum price.
I'm still not comfortable with $105. I'm willing to pay $98, but that's as high as I can go.
I'm not willing to go as low as $98. I'm willing to meet you at $108, which is still a good deal for you, but closer to my minimum price.
I'm still not comfortable with $108. I'm willing to pay $100, but that's as high as I can go.
